sentence.Network_en: Where great passion leaves off and mawkishness begins, I'm not sure.
sentence.Network_cn: 伟大的激情和肉麻的温情之间的分界线究竟在哪里, 我无法确定.

sentence.Network_en: They shift vagariously from farce to satire, and even to mawkishness.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们经常变化,由滑稽转为讽刺, 甚至转为感伤.

list.abs: By sinbawang  you are mawkish 你自作多情 By ajqnicje  mawkish love story 伤感的爱情故事 By dreamingy 笔记(Totally 42)  mawkish maw(牛胃)+kish——牛.
mawkish [5mC:kiF] adj. (1) 令人作呕的, 讨厌的; 无味的 (2) 易流泪的, 易伤感的 mawkish wine 无味的酒 mawkish love story 伤感的爱情故事继承.

means.word_mean: 2. falsely emotional in a maudlin way

auth_sentence.content: Some of the songs here are undeniably sentimental though they generally succeed in avoiding mawkishness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some of the songs here are undeniably sentimental though they generally succeed in avoiding mawkishness.
